comments.en:
For this printer at least Gutenprint 5.x is needed, Gimp-Print 4.x does not support it.

This printer has is an 8-ink (CMYK + red + blue + "gloss enhancer", with two different black inks installed) print head with 1.5 pl drop size. It should be an extremely fast printer with a huge gamut (particularly since it uses UltraChrome inks, which are pigment but which have a very large gamut even in CMYK form).

Consumables/Refills: 8 separately exchangeable ink cartridges
